name: MightyFly, Inc.
description: Provider of logistics and supply chain services intended to serve medical, spare parts, mining, defense, remote and oil and gas industries. The company connects remote locations together with long-range and heavy cargo aircraft, as well as express, customized aerial drone delivery services and provides rapid and efficient package transport, enabling clients with expedited deliveries that are cheaper and faster.
